author: The International Fact-Checking Network
title: Fighting the Infodemic: The #CoronaVirusFacts Alliance
description: Led by the International Fact-Checking Network (IFCN) at the Poynter Institute, the #CoronaVirusFacts / #DatosCoronaVirus Alliance unites more than 100 fact-checkers around the world in publishing, sharing and translating facts surrounding the novel coronavir…
content:
As of March 13, 2020, the members of the #CoronaVirusFacts / #DatosCoronaVirus Alliance include:
15min.lt, AAP FactCheck, AFP, Agência Lupa, Animal Político, Annie Lab, Aos Fatos, BOOM FactCheck, BuzzFeed Japan, CheckNews, Chequeado, Colombiacheck, Correctiv… [+740 chars]
